c74object.name: cs.2click-led
c74object.description: Loaded in a bpatcher, this abstraction lights green if it is receiving signal.

inlet.description: Audio signal to be measured for signal presence.

outlet.description: bgcolor and textcolor messages to send to a UI element.

example.caption: When signal is present, cs.2click-led lights green.

c74object.discussion:
If loaded in a bpatcher, this provides a visual indication of signal presence by lighting green like an LED. It can also be used as a normal abstraction in which case the outlet can be connected to a UI object you want to manipulate in line with signal presence.
When signal is not present, background is set to dark grey, text to white. When signal is present, background is bright green, and text black.
